name: Eric the Moth
description:
A Game Jam Game made in a 3 hour game jam for HKU.

Controls:

Move using WASD, Press W to jump, Hold W to Hover.

Each light gives the player 5 jumps.

Press ESC to restart.

Credits:
Music: Derek & Brandon Fiechter

Programming: Daniel Meyer

Design: Roberto di Bisceglia

Art: Nicole Verberne & Dion Peek
